website_summaries.verdict: A stark contrast to the recent wave of big-bass options, the Bang & Olufsen BeoPlay H6 is a luxury headphone pair for the lover of flat, crisp response.
pros: Near flat-response audio performance, with no distortion at top volumes
Detachable cable with inline remote and microphone for mobile devices
Comfortable fit and thoughtful, simple design
cons: Flat-response sound profile might not suit all listeners

customer_reviews.title: I’m cheating on Sennheiser
customer_reviews.text: So far these have turned into my go to head phones. They’re comfortable, light , they look great, they feel premium. The sound is really good they sit in that in between area not quite Senn HD but better than the momentum 2.0 in a different way where practically every thing you listen to sounds good, natural, sound stage is wide for closed backs. They even take to amplification we’ll hook it up to he amp / computer and they sound even better. Well any way this is my option and for under 200 when got these great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Average Joe

customer_reviews.title: sturdy, comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely a listener headphone: meaning, for chilling and enjoying a piece of music instead of using it as a production headphone for mixing/mastering or recording music, even though it is very flat, well balanced, neutral sounding and everything, but it doesn't quite have a punch (compared to a ATH-M50 a monitor headphone by Audio-Technica). So, high quality sound for enjoying music, which is it's intended purpose! Pros: Well-built, sturdy, comfortable, natural sounding (recommended to be used with a hi-fi sound device of course!). Cons: none. (Maybe, just maybe, a slight lack on the bass response, but I prefer the bass to be less than ideal than more than ideal, which would be quite a nuisance).
customer_reviews.author: Roy

customer_reviews.title: Good balance of style, comfort and audio quality.
customer_reviews.text: The H6 is a good balance of style, comfort and audio quality. It had sufficient bass for most songs and in fact, I prefer the V1 to V2. The V2s had a little too much bass, overshadows some details. Unfortunately, the pair I received was louder in one ear (1 star off for the poor QC), but the RMA policy was excellent and my replacement pair is on the way.
customer_reviews.author: Musician

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so these are very comfy. The headband is sort-of "meh"... but the cups & pads a really nice. If you have a problem with exceptionally large cups/pads (i.e., pressure on your jaw) and don't like a tight clamp... these are definitely worth checking out. Sound is really nice too. Bright, airy, good soundstage, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Todd M

customer_reviews.title: I'd better get some good ones
customer_reviews.text: I hadn't bothered with headphones for years, but needed something for my workouts and the tiny buds that are so popular just keep popping out with too much moving around. I started researching over-the-ear types and was soon in a price stratosphere that I didn't want to be in. However, I kept reading reviews about the incredible sound of the H6's and just decided, if I was going to pull the trigger, I'd better get some good ones. Bottom line, I now look for excuses to use these because it's like entering a different world and all my music has become new again. I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: J. David Gray

customer_reviews.title: Great head speakers.
customer_reviews.text: I am a fan of B&O for a very long time. I got these for traveling. They look great but the head strap it is a little big for my head.The sound quality is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Very good fit. Very good sound
customer_reviews.text: Very good fit. Very good sound. Balance is good and female vocals are very good. I think it is the best product of closed-back Around ear headphones. It is the best choice if you like balance sound rather than a lot of bass.
customer_reviews.author: NHR

customer_reviews.title: ... plugged into an Audio Engine D1 and they sound good. Build quality is very good
customer_reviews.text: I have these plugged into an Audio Engine D1 and they sound good. Build quality is very good. The padding is nice and comfortable and I can wear these for long period of time without hurting my head. I do wish they came with a carrying case but they mostly sit on my desk.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Sounds fine, but not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These would be good headphones, if they didn't crush my head. Maybe if you have a smaller head, or if you don't care about discomfort at all, then these would work for you. Otherwise, stay clear.
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: These headphones have a tuned sound but the tuning is ...
customer_reviews.text: These headphones have a tuned sound but the tuning is definitely done well. Their sound can only be described as rich and not overdone. Definitely not shrill in the higher frequencies but reasonably clear. For that reason, they are headphones meant for listening to music, not analyzing music. :)
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Perry

customer_reviews.title: Weren't comfortable for me.
customer_reviews.text: I know the quality of these head phones is fantastic, but they were so tight on my head that I couldn't wear them. I had to return them. However, a friend of mine has them, and she loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzy

customer_reviews.title: My favorite headphones for recording and mixing.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve owned these a week and they sound wonderful and I feel they produce a ‘true’ sound to the mix. I’ve read other reviews that mention it helps bring out other elements within the recordings and can verify that is true. I disagree regarding comments that the bass is not apparent - I think it’s a great balance and reflects how the mix will translate to speakers. They also look great and are very comfortable to wear for several hours.
customer_reviews.author: T. Graves

customer_reviews.title: beautiful sound, and just the right range of volume
customer_reviews.text: beautiful sound, and just the right range of volume. I've listen to a wide range of music, spoken words, and games. From different sources of sound delivery, and for an extended amount of time. I've even taken them to the gym during lifting. Quality every step of the way.
customer_reviews.author: BenTsuiPhotos

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound! Best for listening music .
customer_reviews.text: Hi! I think that this is a great deal for $ 180 is very high quality sound, the only drawback of this model is the cable :) there is a version without it for $ 500 - there is no good limit. I recommend for music lovers (not for games)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones. They sound great and they are super comfortable. But be warned, clean them before you wear them because mine made me breakout around my ears. Everything is fine though after a good cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Cinnamon

customer_reviews.title: great isolation for noisy environments (I often just wear them ...
customer_reviews.text: Incredible sound, great isolation for noisy environments (I often just wear them with no cord plugged in), and the ability to make and receive calls when they are plugged into an iphone is an added bonus I didn't expect but would find hard to live without having gone a month or so of use.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph A. Brannon

customer_reviews.title: Great and clear sound, but where's the case?
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones, although a bit pricey. The quality of the sound is superb and you can see and feel that they are well made. The only thing that bothers me is that they don't come with a case, and for this price you'd expect that they would.
customer_reviews.author: ABM

customer_reviews.title: They do live up to the hype
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, light headphones with sound that rival open backs. Just wish they came with a case.
customer_reviews.author: stevenj

customer_reviews.title: Marginal Sound Quality
customer_reviews.text: Not the Sound Quality I expected from Bang and Olufsen. Much better sound from Bose or Klipsch
customer_reviews.author: JOHN PELC

customer_reviews.title: Sexy damn headphones!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my girlfriend. The workmanship, quality, and (maybe most important to her) styling are top-notch. These are some SEXY damn headphones!
customer_reviews.author: William R. Merton

customer_reviews.title: Elegant & Awesome Sound
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these because I wanted to try a different brand other than Bose...These are very elegant looking and built real well...Sound is amazing, very lightweight, and plenty loud.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: The product received well. I am happy to make a purchase at a good price. However, there is a feeling that the left-right balance is slightly out of balance. It is not known whether the product is a property or not. We are considering repairing after increasing the use time.
customer_reviews.author: tomirosa

customer_reviews.title: Accurate sound, Comfortable but Fragile
customer_reviews.text: I was really satisfied during the first few days. The sound is accurate(yes accurate and little bass), the cover is very soft. However, here is how it looks like after a week!! The only thing got in touch was my shirt!! Pro: Accurate sound, great parse Comfortable fit Cons: no bass fragile
customer_reviews.author: Aiden G

customer_reviews.title: Excellent baargain
customer_reviews.text: Used for everyday listenting, compact size, beautiful manufacturing, timeless design and above all, pure sound.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Suk

customer_reviews.title: great quality materials
customer_reviews.text: great quality materials. it doenst sounds as loud as i wanted to but quality over sound is amazing! its worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Ivan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sound quality.
customer_reviews.text: I thought my Bose headphones were great. Ha, these amazing!! Better than Bose. Sound quality is clean and crisp. Bass is strong yet clean.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing headphones!!!The best ones I've ever had so far. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent headphones
customer_reviews.text: The best headphones I ever owned!! Currently I have the B&W P5, Bose QuietComfort and now the BeoPlay H6. I would rate the H6 higher than any other pair I have tested. They are light as a feather and I can listen for hours without being uncomfortable. The sound is incredible. Crisp bass and mid-range. Some headphones I have tested sounded 'muddy" and artificial, (I'm talking to you Beats). I run these through my FiiO e-17 amp and I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Cliff M

customer_reviews.title: Nice overall value
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these for acoustical and classical music. I should have listened to everyone with respect to the cable. Terrible. I ordered the one that was suggested and all is now right in the world.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Top of the line headphones, though not the most expensive, but close enough for me.
customer_reviews.text: It is too expensive, unless you possess excellent hearing. It is neutral and natural and comfortable to wear for extended periods. I would not suggest you ever take it out of the house, as someone will liberate it from you and you will miss it mightily.
customer_reviews.author: Kinsey

customer_reviews.title: Awsome audio to your ears!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound in your ears to your head. Let the band play it, awsome listening.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: USE AN AMP
customer_reviews.text: This headphones craps all over whatever headphones you have now, but for the love of god please use an amp or a decent sound card. The bass on these things are deep and earth shaking, you just can't expect it to be powered by your bitchmade iphone jack.
customer_reviews.author: Pradip P.

customer_reviews.title: Crystal clear sound, quality finish, best comfort out of the several other headphones I've owned/used in the luxury segment
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly clear and balanced monitor style sound. Not the extremely warm tone that you get from other headphones whose prices, fit, and finish land them firmly in the "luxury" segment. They're also very comfortable to wear for long periods (8-10 hours) even with glasses on. Compared with: B&W P5 (owned) B&W P7 (demo) PSB M4U 2 (owned) Sennheiser Momentum (demo)
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Q U A L I T Y !!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to live up to the other fine reviews here --- but these earphones DO !!!! Beautiful product. Gorgeous sound. Not bass heavy but I would rather listen to music as it sound from the instruments. LOVE everything from Classical to rock. Just try listening to Pink Floyd Dark side of the Moon on these --- OMG !!!! Real quality manufacture. Well done and thank you Bang & Olusfen.
customer_reviews.author: Neil Williams

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: The sound reproduction is quite excellent - very natural and clear. Plenty of bass. If it is in the music, you'll hear it; if it is not, you won't. Build quality is also excellent with good soft leather on the ear cups and a thick connection cable. It is also quite light, so it is very comfortable to wear for extended periods of time. Only drawbacks are its relatively high price and it doesn't come with a hard case for storage. I've tried many in the $200-$400 range (including Bose QC15, Sennheiser Momentum, NAD HP50, B&W P7, KEF M500), and this is the best overall.
customer_reviews.author: Jammer

customer_reviews.title: They only thing they haven't figured out how to do is keep your ears cool during long periods
customer_reviews.text: These are plush, yet light, and the sound is very very clear. I chose these over my NCs even in airplanes. They only thing they haven't figured out how to do is keep your ears cool during long periods.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel

customer_reviews.title: very clear voice
customer_reviews.text: i tried before other marks.really dont same..its best.thanks for all.really better..high quality voice.i need a case.it must be clean.thanks sir
customer_reviews.author: bülent özata

customer_reviews.title: Best I've Seen
customer_reviews.text: Very high end materials. Comfortable to wear for long periods of time. Love the ability to plug in either side of headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Team B

customer_reviews.title: nice headphones
customer_reviews.text: Nice sounding and comfortable earpieces. A bit expensive when compared with other headphones in this category. Bass is not booming.
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd Nagasawa

customer_reviews.title: love this. My wife also want to buy this ...
customer_reviews.text: love this. My wife also want to buy this after she try. We may purchase another one if the price go down again...
customer_reviews.author: blesshj

customer_reviews.title: Good headphones for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones for the price. I've had Beats Solo, Solo 2, and Studios and these are superior to them in most ways. Very lightweight and feel sturdy for their size. The highs and lows are much more accurate than Beats. However, the Bass is a little lacking compared to Beats. I would say they are about on par with the Solo 2s for the most part. The most striking feature however is the design. If you're in public you'll get plenty of looks.
customer_reviews.author: Sundeep Singh

customer_reviews.title: These sound great and are very nice looking
customer_reviews.text: These sound great and are very nice looking. I'm more into accurate sound and these do great with every type of music. At work everyone has Beats but they are always commenting on how nice these look and they want a pair.
customer_reviews.author: Robboma

customer_reviews.title: The B&O h6 headphones are a keeper.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the B&O H6. I am not a fan of most headphones which have exaggerated bass and rolled off high end. This includes the B&W P7. Some may feel the H6 is too bright, but I love the detail and clarity.
customer_reviews.author: Dave T.

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding natural sound with just the right amount of base. Very comfortable. Although expensive, well worth the price Extraordinary quality.
customer_reviews.author: R. J. Barnett

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable headphones I have ever owned. Excellent sound isolation. A little flat on the low end. Love the ability to plug the cord into either side.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Wild

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's about quality and comfort! You can wear these for 10 hours and not feel a thing
customer_reviews.author: Banjaraz

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: Really nice pair of headphones. Very comfortable and good sound quality
customer_reviews.author: Martin Walker

customer_reviews.title: Like new condition Warehouse deal
customer_reviews.text: Sound is great- isolates you nicely from surroundings- the portion of over the top of your head could be more comfortable: seems to sit heavy on the top of your head.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge

customer_reviews.title: One of the best headphones
customer_reviews.text: In between Beoplay H6, Sony MDR1A and Sennheiser HD 598; I enjoyed Beoplay H6 the most.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are great! Since these cover your whole ear I was worried that my ears would get hot, but that hasn't been an issue yet. The sound quality is amazingly clear. Bass is natural sounding but not overwhelming.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Lee

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: They sound is superb and well balanced; the construction is solid, light & stylish; they feel divine; and, they are convenient to cary around. I am a medical student. I spend hours in the library studying. My old head phones hurt my ears after a few hours of use. These are so soft and light, I can go all day and forget they are on! The lambskin-memory foam cups are softer than described and provide a nice sound barrier. The fold-flat storage and bag works great in a backpack. Two months in and I still get excited to use them!
customer_reviews.author: CAJ

customer_reviews.title: Very excellent headphones!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice headphones. They are super comfortable and have great sound. They look good too. They come with a little bag to carry them in which has worked well for me so far. I got mine back in July-ish. They are expensive, it's true. But I think it's well worth it - I definitely won't be replacing them anytime soon.
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian

customer_reviews.title: I'm keeping them
customer_reviews.text: I have sent back several headphones over the past year. I just could not find the right one for me. These have everything I wanted. They look great, are very comfortable and sound amazing. The clarity and detail in acoustic type music is about the best I have heard right out of my iphone. They still sound great for just about everything else to.
customer_reviews.author: stickersteve

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, for sure!
customer_reviews.text: Great for what they are. Comfy if you aren't wearing earrings. Sound is good. Do kinda wish they were louder.
customer_reviews.author: Jen in Tx

customer_reviews.title: good but the color of the leather change by time
customer_reviews.text: The perfect head phone I tried there is one issue with it, The color of leather around your ear will change to black by time so it's better to take the black color of this item.
customer_reviews.author: Yamato

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! Only $319 on Black Friday for this wonderful earphone!
customer_reviews.author: Fei Wu

customer_reviews.title: very good!
customer_reviews.text: it's really very good with a very cool looking! i loved it and wear it everyday. many friends tried and want to buy one, too.
customer_reviews.author: Ran Wang

customer_reviews.title: No better set of cans out there. Period.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing headphones. Well worth the $$! I highly recommend the BeoPlay H6 headphones for anyone looking for an improvement over the headphones (or lack thereof) that they are currently using. These cans hit the full range of audio. I have mine connected to my MacBook Air, through a Schiit DAC (Modi) and amplifier (Magni)... the sound is amazing and simply out-of-this-world good. Comfortable and easy to wear for looooong listening sessions.
customer_reviews.author: ShortStuff

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Just that buttons on cable are not ...
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Just that buttons on cable are not good quality
customer_reviews.author: Mehul Shah

customer_reviews.title: B&O Bog Standard really!
customer_reviews.text: Used these for about a year. Started it out good. Losing ability to accept increased gain now. Most youtube vids need to be on ear bleeding max, but are far from damaging hearing.
customer_reviews.author: Jon A. Mccarty

customer_reviews.title: Hands down the most amazing headphones, they sound better than my bowers and ...
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the most amazing headphones , they sound better than my bowers and Wilkins btw
customer_reviews.author: Nidal Yaghmour

customer_reviews.title: Headphone sound is great but a bit metallic tinny for certain string instruments
customer_reviews.text: Headphone sound is great but a bit metallic tinny for certain string instruments. Unfortunately the leather around the EarPods starting to discolor already in 2-3 months. That's highly unacceptable for a $400 headphone. I'll contact the support
customer_reviews.author: Amlan Chatterjee

customer_reviews.title: Sounds very good but its accesories are AWFUL
customer_reviews.text: 1: Love the sound ...5 stars. 2: The accessories are awful. Its airline jack adaptor does not work ..flied with 3 different airplanes ..none of them works. I am so upset. 3: the case -bad. It costs 400USA, it should have a better protected case than a cloth bag. However, the string for tied up is broken when I used it first time. The bose headphone has a very good case. 4: After I bought this and I found that the remote control only works for Apple . It should have a choice for other OS such as Android or PC.
customer_reviews.author: Nam T. Hoang

customer_reviews.title: Good mechanically dut disappointing sound
customer_reviews.text: Did not like the sound at all, totally lows less, not sure if I got 2nd or 1st gen
customer_reviews.author: rhhcwd

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Your ganna enter the another world by using this spectacle sound tool.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Harsh sounding, The drums sound like they were recorded in ...
customer_reviews.text: Average at best. The drums sound like they were recorded in a room next to the rest of the instruments. Maybe an amp will help but I need them to be portable. Nad hp50 is a much better sounding headphone. So I decided to give the H6 another try and purchase a Vamp Verza to go between the H6 and the iPhone. The Vamp Verza does a great job of bringing detailed clean music to the H6 phones. The problem is th H6 are the most harsh sounding headphones on the planet. Sorry but to me B&O was always the Eurpopean Bose and they still are. Take my advise and avoid these headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Gadget lover

customer_reviews.title: not great quality for price
customer_reviews.text: this item is very expensive it went bad several days ago, and i think for the price is not really that great product given that one side of the headphones now works properly, I will send this to get a replacement but so far i am not pleased given the price
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Really amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I have always been a BIG fan of B&O. First pair received were defective. I decided to give these another try. Ordered them again. Out of the box they worked perfect! By the way the plug worked well. They delivered great sound. Sounds like there is some inconsistency in their construction, and quality control. Sound is amazing! I am really loving them! Amazing presence like you are right there. I can hear the effect of the rosin on the bow, the angle of the finger strike on the string.
customer_reviews.author: Tony DeVoe

customer_reviews.title: Very VERY great sound out of these!
customer_reviews.text: From the moment he put these on his head, he loved these! I’m order more so when he travels I have a pair to send off while his original ones stay home!
customer_reviews.author: MB

product_meta.title: B&O Play by Bang & Olufsen Beoplay H6 (Black)
feature_bullets: Carefully selected high quality materials like leather and aluminum make Beoplay H6 comfortable to wear and bring a sense of everyday luxury. Also, every day wear and tear merely adds patina, and makes BeoPlay H6 age beautifully.
The head band needs to be durable and age with grace. Therefore, we have chosen cow leather, that gains patina and personality when worn.

B&O PLAY products come with a 2-year limited warranty only when purchased from an authorized dealer including Amazon.com (indicated by ships from and sold by Amazon.com).Dimensions - 7.8 X 7.6 X 1.6 in
Includes a 40 mm custom designed driver with a neodymium magnet in a closed headphone design.
BeoPlay H6 has a bass port which optimizes the bass performance and the drivers are slightly angled to get the best distance and sound direction into the ears.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars329 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
